name: Redshirt Fodder
description:
Redshirt Fodder is an entry for the  'Syntax Bomb' Mixed Genre competition 2018: Option 1 : Retro / Strategy

https://www.syntaxbomb.com/index.php/topic,4503.0.html

Inspired by the Amiga game:  Cannon Fodder and Star Trek

Developed in Monkey2!

******

You are the Redshirt Fleet's top captain in charge of an elite squad of Redshirts, explore new worlds and new ways to die!

Controls

Use the mouse, left button to set a way-point and right button to shoot.

To enter a shuttle, get a red shirt close to it and then click on the shuttle. To land the shuttle, click on the shuttle (the shuttle cannot land on some areas of the maps).
